Text: Expenses repayment for Enron EuropeI was told by you that our expenses were going to get paid as per your voice mail However I was laid off from Enron Europe last Friday with another people and we were told that our expenses were not going to be repaid by the company Can you please explain the conflict between the two messages and let me know who will reimburse me I am owed from Enron Chris

Freight weekly report Cc Shipping Services Weekly report Highlight Coeclerici deal is on track for completion in a weeks time Looking for our second big cape deal with potentially SK Shipping or Bocimar which would net out all our underlying expossure with Coeclerici and allow us to keep the options Fixed a Panamax on subject with Bocimar for months to do the first grain cargo US gulfJapan with Dreyfus Market Short term Medium term Long Term Handy Max UP Flat Flat Panamax UP UP Flat Cape Size Flat Flat Flat Panamax Market continues to rise in the east from Australia to China and next year based soly on sentiment Capes Market is a little flat as many asian countries were on holiday this week Crude is not falling which keeps owners unwilling to discount Deals Done Physical Freight ECS freight Still on subject geared panamaxes from Indo to Hong Kong for November to January at Third parties freight deals As stated above fixed our first Panamax on TC with Bocimar at OTC FFA s Bought long swaps from cargill for next year on panamax with intent to resale quickly Deal Flow We have given rate indications on the following Rates to Preag Rates for Arcadia coal purchase from US Gulf capes to Mission for late this year into Redcar Still trying to sell our length in the pacific as rates increased by day and feel it is right time to sell Miscellaneous We are having a conference call with ABC to discuss a potential bid for their company Meeting Elcano spanish utility next week to discuss grouping our resources to buy ABC Have hired an EOL trader Andy James with start date October Travels None Both Pierre and I in the office all next week
